name: Pink Lens, Red Hands
description:
Pink Lens, Red Hands is a visual novel created for itchio user eevee's "GAMES MADE QUICK??? 1½" Game Jam  in 2017. 

You're Casey Lovelace (but you can change your name, too). You're living a pretty fabulous lifestyle for someone that was comatose three years ago. You even lost your memories. At least you're safe and sound! 

But how long does that last?

There are 6 endings in the game! Gameplay is 30 minutes to an hour depending on your reading speed.

Things to note about this game: Implied sexual material, implied violence, blood, transphobia and a lot of cursing.
